name: Siege Saga
description: Siege Saga is the 2D physics puzzle sandbox in which you must protect yourself by building fortifications against your enemies’ projectiles. It’s like Angry Birds but the other way round!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  10, 8.1, 7, XP or Server 2008. Processor: 2.33GHz or faster or 1.6GHz or faster for notebook class devices. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9+ GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: optional
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  10, 8.1, 7 Processor: 2.5GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9+ GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: optional
